page.title: 09Vandalism And Pets
page.content: Stanhope is the most vandalised area in Weardale although vandalism is not a great problem in Stanhope. A vast majority of the population said that if they witnessed an act of vandalism they would report it to the police whether they recognised the culprit or not. Scraping cars ,smashing windows with air rifles ,damaging public telephones and writing on walls are the main acts of vandalism in Stanhope. Not many people complain. Old people mostly. 3/4 think the 37.5p dog licence is too low. 1/4 thought it was about right.Everyone thought dogs should not be allowed to roam unattended. A vast majority think dog owners should be stopped from exercising their dogs in children's playgrounds. Not many people have a dog licence.
